DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect community-based counseling intervention improve contraception among resident two deprive neighborhood Barcelona ( Spain ) . Half participant receive contraceptive counseling community setting , half act control group .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Contraceptive Counseling Intervention Deprived Neighborhoods : SIRIAN Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate effect community-based counseling intervention improve contraception among resident deprive neighborhood randomize control trial performed . Women age 14-49 year men age 14-39 year two low income neighborhood Barcelona ( Catalonia , Spain ) undergone irreversible contraceptive method n't plan pregnancy recruit 2011-13 . The intervention consist culturally developed theoretically-based brief counsel community setting . The primary outcome consistent use effective contraceptive method ( optimal use ) . Secondary outcome analyze incorrect use effective contraceptive method use less effective method stratify sex migrant status . Differences within subgroup baseline 3 month - follow analyze intervention effect assess adjust robust Poisson regression .
DOC.criteria: Women live select neighbourhood age 1449 year Men live select neighbourhood age 1439 year Having undergone irreversible contraceptive method Whishing planning pregnancy next year
